review: The reception staff was very friendly. The consultation started at the appointment time. Doctor was friendly and explained the issue and treatment properly. The centre is quite good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visiting Dr jayanthi for my daughter regularly.. She loves the way Dr jayanthi and her team makes her comfortable.  I went  for scaling and then doctor examined and told me completely about oral care and what was the issue with my teeth.  I had fillings done for my treatment. Through out the course they make the patient comfortable. Best part is the way they are prepared and taking care of the safety measures towards covid.  Hygiene is commendable. Even the front office staffs are polite and will guide u very well. One of the best clinic I have seen.  Cost wise no comments... When we get the best and it is fruitful cost becomes secondary.. But still I can say reasonable and worth. ***** **** ***** ** * **** ****** ****** ** ********** ****.  Thanks Dr Jayanthi and team.
reply_text:
Thank you so much ma'am for your very nice review and kind words..
Best regards Dr Jayanthi N & Team The Dental Square Multispeciality Dental Clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is my first time writing a google review for anyone, but I must say that this dental clinic deserves 5stars.‚ù§Ô∏è
I had nothing but great experiences.
I will start by saying that on my  first visit to this clinic I was very impressed. 
The interiors, I would give it a 10/10.
The clinic is so clean at all times and the staffs working here are so well versed with their job.
The doctors and the staffs have taken good precautionary measures and post treatment measures for the current covid situation üå∏
The doctors are using personal protective equipment and face shield as well. 
I had my appointment with Dr. Ashita and I must say that I was really impressed üòç . She did a great job and explained all the treatment procedures before starting and also listened to what I had to say.
Dr. Ashita also gave me post treatment plans to take care of my retainers. And Dr.javanthi‚Äôs dental office is very beautiful. The ambience it creates is very relaxing.
reply_text:
Thank you Shreya Pradhan for your kind words and feedback
Best Regards Dr Jayanthi N Team The Dental Square multispeciality Dental Clinic

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Painful experience as my 3.8 years old son (Dental square registration number 3356) had to go an emergency operation to save his life *** ** **** ****** *** ***** ******* ********* ** *** ******** ***** Please read my full honest/unbiased review before visiting the Dental Square.

I am an NRI who lives in London, recently I was in Bangalore and looking for a good dental clinic to treat the cavity for my 3.8 years old son. I enquired in my housing society (Godrej Ecity) for a good dental clinic in electronic city phase-1, some of my neighbors recommended the Dental Square Neeladari road ecity branch. So I visited the clinic on Dec 7th 2019 and met Dr Sneha and Dr Jayanthi. Dr Sneha started the RCT/Pulpectomy treatment for son first on right lower tooth on 12th Dec and after 3 days on left side lower tooth. My son started having the swelling on right side from 19th Dec 2019 onwards, this started increasing day by day, ***** ******* **** *** **** ** **** ** *** ******** ** **** ******** ******* ***** * ***** I lost the trust on the experience of these doctors and started consulting my relative who works as a pediatrician ** ***** *** ****** ** ******* ** ** *** ********** *** ** *** ***** **** ** *** ********** *** ********** ****** *** ******** ** *** ***** *** *** ** *** ******* ** *** **** ****** ************* ****** ***** *** ******* ********** ******** *** my son had 102 fever on/off in few hours, the situation deteriorated further as these doctors stopped answering the emails or phone calls *** ***** ** *** ****** **** ** ***** ******** I had to admit my son ** ******* ******** *********** on 24th Dec 2019 for an emergency operation to remove the pus as infection started in his whole body which was a life threatening situation. ** ******* ********* ********** ******** ** ******* ********** ****** ******** operated my son on 25th Dec 2019 and now my son is recovering from this surgery. This costed my 40,000 INR for the operation, so much pain to my son as this was done in General anesthesia, you can only imagine what kid of pain we have experienced.whole incid. ** *** ********* ****** **** ** *** ***** ***** ******* doctors are not sharing the x-ray report soft copy with me ** **** **** **** **** ***** *** ******* *** ****** Now I don‚Äôt know what to do next as my son‚Äôs both side tooth conditions are in very bad shape and we can not afford another root canal ** **** *** ******* *** ***** ********** *** ****** ***** ** **** ******* this has made my son‚Äôs life completely difficult and now we are in painful situation.*************** ****** ****** *********** **** *** ******** ********** **** ** ***** *** ** **** ** * ****** ** **** ****** ******* **** ****** *** ***** ******* ****** ******* **** *** ******* *** *** *** ********* **** ********** ** **** ******** ***** **** ******** ** ** **** * ***** **** *** **** ******* ***** ******* *** ******** ****** *********** ** ****** *** ************ ** **** ****** *** ******** ******* ** ***** ********
reply_text:
Mr Vipul Udainiya
We normally ensure that the treatments rendered to the best standards.
The same was done for your 3.8 year old son as well.
As explained in my communication to you earlier when you raised concerns same I repeat.
The treatment has been impeccable.
However there has been total ignorance towards our post procedure instructions by the Local Guardians under whose care the child is as informed by you . 
Also you didn't bring him for follow ups after repeated calls.
Regards
Team The Dental Square Multispeciality Dental Clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Artificial Teeth,Conservative Dentistry,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Dr Jayanthi treats us like a friend. She is very open and explains about the cause, treatment and care in great detail. She takes utmost care to ensure that we have a painless procedure. I had a tooth fracture in upper left canine tooth. I am feeling fine, post Root Canal and permanent filing. A ceramic crown would be placed on the canine tooth to give it the look as it was before.
I would like to tell all that our teeth are a vital part of our body, please don't try to become a doctor yourself, if you have any problem, do visit doctor, and don't hesitate or doubt to follow their instructions or procedures they recommend. It's for our long term benefits.
Thank you Jayanthi mam.
Best wishes and Regards
Abhijeet Singh Arora
reply_text:
Thank you Abhijeet for your kind words..
Best regards
Dr Jayanthi N

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: To be true I was sceptical when I was told that I need an RCT. tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i had visited for toothache, Dr immediately advised extraction. But I said i will come back after a few days. in the meantime i took second opinion with another Dentist. ***** *** ****** ******* *** ***** ********** ****** **** ***** ***** **** **** ******** *** ********* *** ******* *** ******* ********* *** ********* ** ** ** ** **** ************ *** * ****** **** ** ******* ********** ************  it is interesting and rather surprised to have been informed post this feedback, that Dental square has refused to accept that i even visited their clinic. I gave Uploaded the requisite prescription for the kind perusal.
reply_text:
Dear Karthik
Practo verified that you never visited us for tooth extraction which you claimed in your earlier review .
We have entirely digitised prescription so there is an impeccable way of the way we maintain records.
Your registration form clearly states wisdom tooth pain as area of concern and we really fail to understand the intention behind this review.
However , if we are able to help you in any way do contact us.
Best regards
Team The Dental Square Multispeciality Dental Clinic
